name: test_e2e_with_logs[XSS_REFL_007]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XSS_REFL_007` |
| **Name** | Select onfocus XSS |
| **Category** | XSS |
| **Subcategory** | reflected_xss |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `<select onfocus=alert('XSS') autofocus>`
- **Encoded**: `%3Cselect%20onfocus%3Dalert%28%27XSS%27%29%20autofocus%3E`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Rule ID** | `ADV_XSS_001` |
| **Expected Rule** | DOM-based XSS Attack |
| **Actual Rule** | [NGINX XSS] Polyglot XSS Attack test_id=XSS_REFL_007-1765108966838-us67re pattern_id=XSS_REFL_007 uri=/?q=%3Cselect%20onfocus%3Dalert%28%27XSS%27%29%20autofocus%3E client=127.0.0.1 method=GET |
| **Match Status** | `MISMATCH` |

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~15000ms
- **Timestamp**: 12:02:46.000 UTC
